Name: Hyperspace Beacon
Special Effect: reduces travel time for incoming ships

Name: Land Reclamation
Special Effect: Increases planet max ground space by 1

Name: Orbital Clearing
Special Effect: Increases planet max orbital space by 1

Name: Jump Gate
Special Effect: reduces travel time for incoming friendly ships, required on origin and destination

Name: Freighter
Special Effect: Stores up to 120000 metal and 80000 mineral; capacity of 40000 shared for energy, food and colonists

Name: Merchant
Special Effect: Stores up to 240000 metal and 160000 mineral; capacity of 80000 shared for energy, food and colonists

Name: Trader
Special Effect: Stores up to 480000 metal and 320000 mineral; capacity of 160000 shared for energy, food and colonists
